maharagama siri wajiranyana dharmayathanaye wadihiti sila samadana pinkama perawaru 06.00-07.00 sil samadan karawima saha buddha pujawa pawathwima, amarikawe hawayi bauddha madhyasthana wiharawasi, winayacharya hingurakgoda wibhawi himi, 08.00-09.00 bhawanawa rajakiya panditha shasthrapathi hakmana sumanasiri himi, 09.00-10.00 suthra deshanawa agalawaththa kithulgoda aaranya senasanadhipathi walimada pasanna manasa himi, 10.00-11.00 dharma deshanawa,jayawardhanapura wishwa widyalaye mahacharya madagampitiye wijithadhamma himi, 11.00-11.15 buddha pujawa, sithulpawwe wajiradhamma himi, nawalapitiye uditha himi, paswaru 12.15-12.20 wishesha niwedana ha punyanumodanawa, 12.20-12.45 pirith ha theruwan guna indiyawe maithripala himi, athulnuwara indrapala himi, 12.45-1.45 dharma sakachchawa , shasthrapathi panditha ududumbara lankananda himi, 01.45-02.45 dharma deshanawa udahamulla panynyodharamawasi shasthrapathi walgama sumana himi, 02.45-03.45 dharma deshanawa, rajakiya panditha higure panynyasekara himi, 04.00-05.00 dharma deshanawa, bambalapitiya wajiraramawasi shasthrawedi rajakiya panditha waligepola silawansa himi, 05.00-06.00 dhammapadaya rajakiya panditha shasthrapathi panadure pasanna himi, 06.00-06.30 bodhipujawa saha sil aluth kirima, meheyawima, rajakiya panditha shasthrapathi hakmana sumanasiri himi.

ohu dewana jathyantharaya thula, ehi pa්ramukha pakshaya wu jarmanu samaja pa්rajathantha්rawadi pakshaya (espidi) ha pa්ransaye kamkaru jathyantharaye pa්ransa shakhawa (esefayi oo) yuda ayawayata chandaya demin kala pawadima athitha awasthawadaya samaga bandi pawathiye kese da yanna pennum kale, eeta erehiwa siya aragalaye warthawak da sahithawa menma pawadime waishayika mulayan wibhaga karamin idiri aragalaya sandaha idiridarshana ha ki්rayamargaya sakas kirimata da piyawara ganimini. 1914 sapthambar muladi yuropiyanu yuddhaya thula wiplawawadi samaja pa්rajathantha්rawadinge karthawyayo yanuwen yojanawak lesa idiripath kala liyawilla thula yuddhaye dhaneshwara ha adhirajyawadi swabhawaya satahan karamin lenin mese sandahan kaleya: “dewana jathyantharaye (1889-1914) boho nayakayan wisin samajawadaya pawadenu labimen salakunu keranne jathyantharaye drushtiwadathmaka saha deshapalana bankolothkamayi.

kapila somarathna panadura samuha.panadura gorakana parana galupara mansandhiye sita mehenin wahansela pa gamanin sakyadhitha puhunu bhawana madhyasthanaya wetha wadama kala ayuru.2600 sambuddhathwa jayanthiya nimiththen mehenin wahansela 150 namakata danayak pirinamime uthsawayak panadura gorakane gal kanuwa pare sakyadhitha puhunu bhawana madhyasthanaye di ikuth 27 wana da sidu karini.ema maha pinkama sanwidhanaya kale gorakana sakyadhitha puhunu bhawana madhyasthanaye pradhani saha pinkam kamituwa yi.padukke sumithra mehenin wahanse pamina siti sadahawathun pancha silayehi pihituwuwaya.pradhana mehenin wahanse athulu mehenin wahansela ema awasthawata wadama kara siti ayuru.aagamika katayuthu aarambha wethma chiragatha sampradanukulawa polthel pahanak dal wuye panadura pradeshiya sabhawe hitapu manthri shantha bandara mahatha pradana uwasiyan wisini.

wandana charikawak sandaha polonnaruwata giya mohothaka ahamben asa gatunu mema thorombal karaththaya saha ee asala hun mema awihinsaka widi dariya pilibanda sithehi upan sanwegajanaka sithiwilla ohu wisin melesa githawath karana ladi.
